episode_event_academy_summer/4001_1001_0: We’ve been waiting for you three!

All three of us finally made it to
Pasio Academy!

I’ve wanted everyone to come ever since
it opened!

You’re doing a trial enrollment this time,
right?

Yup! I’m pretty sure we’ll be enrolling right
after, though!

All three of us were really excited to go to
school together!
episode_event_academy_summer/4001_1001_1: Why is Brendan already in uniform?
Heheh... I kinda got ahead of myself.
Of course, but hang on a sec.

One more person was scheduled for a trial
enrollment today.
You all got here so early!
episode_event_academy_summer/6801_1001_0: I’m so curious what’s out there to learn!

When I’ve got friends around, I can do my
best—even if the subject’s tough!

Yeah. You’ll have friends at school who’ll
be learning by your side.

It’s fun when everyone gets along. Plus, you
can accomplish more. Right?
episode_event_academy_summer/4002_1001_0:
So the other person who wanted a trial
enrollment today...

I’m sure you’re busy, being a Champion and
all. Are you gonna be OK?

I’m gonna study sooooo much here at
Pasio Academy too!

Well, back in Unova, I used to study a bunch
at Drayden’s house!

But I heard that at an academy, everyone
can study all in one place!
episode_event_academy_summer/4002_1001_1:
Ever since I learned that, I’ve really wanted
to come here!
So that’s why you’re wearing a uniform?
Ehehe! Yup! I just couldn’t wait!
They’re getting along so well already!

OK! The whole gang’s here, so let’s start
the tour!
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_1101_0:
After observing some lessons and touring the
campus, the group reached the rooftop.
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_1001_0:
Wow! Pasio Academy even has a rooftop
area?!
This is so cool! Look how far we can see!

Lots of students hang out here between
classes, so it’s kinda used as a break area.
It doesn’t look too crowded today.
Ah! I see someone over there!

Oh, the Champion of Unova. That’s quite a
posse you’ve got there.
Were you doing some thinking by yourself?
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_1001_1: Yeah. I was just cooling off for a bit.
Why? Did you have a fight with someone?

I just couldn’t understand something in my
computer class.

I was working on a programming
assignment, and it was really complicated...

So I figured I’d get some fresh air and
organize my thoughts.
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_0301_1:
I wonder what that class would be
like!
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_0401_1:
Yeah! I don’t know much about it, but it
sounds interesting!
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_0402_2:
Yeah... It’s not easy, but I thought it’d be
worth learning.
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_1001_2:
I’ve got a review class on it coming up.
Wanna check it out?

It’ll help me to have an audience. Can’t look
uncool, you know?
OK, let’s make that our next stop!

I’m curious, too. But I actually wanted to
sit in on Mr. Jacq’s biology class.

He’s going to talk about the Terastal
phenomenon, so I was curious, too!
Why don’t we split into two groups, then?
I’ll lead the way to Mr. Jacq’s class!
episode_event_academy_summer/4003_1001_3: And we’ll head to the computer class!
episode_event_academy_summer/4004_1001_0: I’m here for the programming class.
Oh. Hi. Then...you can sit over there...

Um...well... I’m helping out the usual teacher
by substituting.

I know a lot about computers, so I figured I
could teach for a bit.

I wasn’t expecting so many people to show
up, though. Now I’m getting nervous...

Don’t worry. They’re just here to observe
today.
Let’s start the lesson, shall we, Teach?
episode_event_academy_summer/4004_1001_1:
...And that’s how it works. Does that make
sense?

This is way more complicated than I 
expected!
Aw, I didn’t understand any of it!

Don’t feel bad if you didn’t get it. This is the
part where a lot of beginners struggle.
Sorry, Teach. Could you explain it again?
I won’t give up! Not until I get it!

But why do you want to understand so
badly? We don’t have any exams coming up.
episode_event_academy_summer/4004_1001_2: It’s so I can get to know this guy better.

Porygon-Z’s a Pokémon that was created
artificially, and it has a strong connection to
computer programming.

I figured if I got better at computers, I could
deepen my bond with Porygon-Z.
So for its sake...let’s try again, Teach.
Let’s try a different method this time...

Is there anything we can do to help him get
along better with Porygon-Z?

Maybe we could try learning about
computers alongside Gladion.
episode_event_academy_summer/4004_1001_3:
I’m sure it’ll be more fun if we all study
together!

OK! We’re gonna learn how to make some
AWESOME programs!

Looks like Penny’s programming class is
gonna be lively!
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_1001_0:
Thanks to everyone who studied hard
with me...
I understand programming a lot better now.
I think Porygon-Z and I are closer than ever.
If I hadn’t seen you guys on the rooftop...
I might’ve given up at some point.
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_0301_0: I had a lot of fun studying with you!
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_0401_0:
Yeah! It was hard to understand, but it was
fun learning something new!
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_0401_1:
We should use what we learned and make
something!
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_0402_1:
I’m so happy for you, Gladion! You really
became better friends with Porygon-Z!
And we all got to bond with each other, too!
episode_event_academy_summer/4005_1001_1: Let’s keep studying and doing our best!

We’ve been sitting in front of computers
all day. My muscles are stiff!

Why don’t we go to the schoolyard and get
some exercise?
Good idea! If it’s physical, I won’t lose!
